q.quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
q.author: Chris Rock

q.quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
q.author: Bruce Lee

q.quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
q.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

q.quote: To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.
q.author: Oscar Wilde

q.quote: When you think positive, good things happen.
q.author: Matt Kemp

q.quote: Acting is not about being famous, it's about exploring the human soul.
q.author: Annette Bening

q.quote: The best way to solve problems and to fight against war is through dialogue.
q.author: Malala Yousafzai

q.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
q.author: Will Rogers

q.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
q.author: Billie Jean King

q.quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth.
q.author: Leo Tolstoy

q.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
q.author: Lao Tzu

q.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
q.author: Lao Tzu

q.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
q.author: Mother Teresa

q.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
q.author: Lao Tzu

q.quote: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself.
q.author: Douglas Horton
